thread.title: BRIEF-Rite Aid Completes Transfer Of Stores To Walgreens Boots Alliance And Terminates Tax Benefits Preservation Plan

title: BRIEF-Rite Aid Completes Transfer Of Stores To Walgreens Boots Alliance And Terminates Tax Benefits Preservation Plan
text:
45 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Rite Aid Completes Transfer Of Stores To Walgreens Boots Alliance And Terminates Tax Benefits Preservation Plan Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 28 (Reuters) - Rite Aid Corp: 
* RITE AID COMPLETES TRANSFER OF STORES TO WALGREENS BOOTS ALLIANCE AND TERMINATES TAX BENEFITS PRESERVATION PLAN 
* RITE AID CORP - BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS TERMINATED TAX BENEFITS PRESERVATION PLAN THAT IT ADOPTED ON JANUARY 3 
* RITE AID CORP - AS A RESULT OF THE TAX BENEFITS PRESERVATION PLAN, CO PROTECTED ABOUT $2.2 BILLION OF COâ€™S NET OPERATING LOSSES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
